name: Mercure Hotel Atrium Braunschweig

reviews.title: Clean basic room
reviews.text: I was expecting more based on coworkers reviews a Bigger room and more comfortable amenities and better food...but this is where my company stays so here I was for 2 nights. Room was very basic but extremely clean compared to most hotels in US. Mattress wasn't very comfortable... Like a thin futon mattress. The AC when turned on had a terrible smell... Had to check under bed just to be sure nothing dead was under it. So I kept off and window open; noise from street and trams didn't run to late keeping me awake or thanks to jet lag, I slept like a rock. I had free decent Internet and breakfast over priced but no other option around but McDonalds. I did take tram to city center and enjoyed the evening there. Knowing very little German it was still easy to get around on my own. Guess I'll stay again with no options near the office.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was well positioned near the train station and tram stops. The hotel and room was very comfortable and clean. The breakfast was excellant with lots of choice. The sports bar was good for a late night drink and the bar food was OK.
reviews.title: Great hotel opposite station

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located near railway station. About 15 minutes walk to the centre,but a very good tram service to the centre. Tram numbers 1m and 5m cost 2 euros one way. Did not have the breakfast,having taken notice of some of the reviews 16 euros seems a little over the top for this type of hotel.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: Good Business Hotel ideally located across the Braunschweig main Station with WIFI and a nice internet Corner . Great Breakfast , Good Food and a Cosy bar. Polite & efficient Service
reviews.title: Good - well located

description: Let good things happen... that's our philosophy! Located within easy reach of the main train station (164 yards [150 m]), park (33 yards [30 m]), convention center (547 yards [500 m]) and the historic center (1640 yards [1500 m]), our 3-star superior business hotel is the ideal base for all your activities. Make the most of every day! Communicate creatively in our 9 air-conditioned meeting rooms for up to 250 people. Our unique Atrium architecture, modern facilities (including sports bar with Sky HD) and personal service will ensure you have a stay to remember.
